response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds significant value to us at $1,500,000, reflecting its unique features and high-quality craftsmanship. Considering its immense worth to you, I propose to offer it to you at a special price of $1,350,000. This represents a substantial saving compared to its market value, providing you with an excellent investment opportunity. I trust this proposal will resonate with your interest in securing such a valuable asset at an advantageous rate. Please let me know if you require any further information or have questions about the product. I look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 1350000}
